title: Toca Life Stories
overview: Toca Life Stories is a Swedish-American animated series of shorts based on the characters and settings of Toca Boca's popular Toca Life app series, created by Johanna Anderson, Edward Moulder and Viktor Khan. The show follows the everyday adventures of four friends – Rita, Zeke, Nari, and Leon – who vanquish boredom and their everyday struggles in their neighborhood of OK Street. The series explores themes of friendship, boredom, and community, often with a touch of surreal humor and relatable situations. The two pilot episodes first premiered on YouTube in late February 2020.
